pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ecghelperA utility package for working with electrocardiograms, particularly 12-lead electrocardiograms.## Quickstart```shpip install ecghelper```### DevelopmentAssuming `conda` or `mamba` are available in the shell, you can create a virtual environment for package development as follows.```shconda create -y -n ecghelper "python>=3.9"conda activate ecghelperpip install ecghelper[dev]```If you are using `zsh`, you will need to escape the square brackets, i.e.:```shpip install ecghelper\[dev\]```## Converting functionsDebug - directly call the entry point.```python -m pdb src/ecghelper/__main__.py convert -i 82000.xml -f xml -o 82000_wfdb -t wfdb```
